content: this is a summary of a legal judgment from the district court in ljubljana the plaintiff incurred costs of 531551 euros which the defendant is responsible for paying the legal procedure lasted for 3 years 4 months and 20 days the final resolution involves the division of movable property between two expartners with each party receiving an equal share the specific sections of the marriage family relations act used in the decision are sections 51 and 59 the court ruled that the parties will each have a 50 share in the coowned property which includes various items the plaintiffs claim for a specific dwelling house and garage was dismissed the defendant was ordered to pay the plaintiffs legal costs the court carefully assessed the circumstances of the case and determined the necessary costs for the defendant the judgment can be appealed within 30 days and specific requirements must be met for the appeal to be considered valid
